item.description: The Washington square Starbucks, at the Washington square T stop on the C Green line. The Starbucks is right next to a Chinese restaurant called the Golden Temple. I (Cathy) will try to find a place outside and sit with a book on the table so you can find me. I'll try to get there early to save a few tables, but seating might be a stretch. We'll be meeting to discuss what kind of books we'll be reading, any literary or non-literary activities we'll participate it, and in general just to get to know each other over a warm, refreshing cup of $70 coffee. So let's rock this mother!
item.name: Brookline Meetup
